solution_line_template: The cost of his food, before the voucher, was ${appetizer_cost} + ${ribeye_cost} + ${wine_glass_cost} + ${wine_glass_cost} + ${cheesecake_cost} = $<<{appetizer_cost}+{ribeye_cost}+{wine_glass_cost}+{wine_glass_cost}+{cheesecake_cost}={full_meal_cost_before_voucher}>>{full_meal_cost_before_voucher}.

So the full price of Arthur's meal, with tip, was ${full_meal_cost_before_voucher} - ${voucher_savings} + {tip_amount} = $<<{full_meal_cost_before_voucher}-{voucher_savings}+{tip_amount}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
